definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Or laid great bases for eternity.
sentences.chinese: 或奠下伟大基础，要留芳万代。

sentences.english: But the plans of the Lord stand firm forever, the purposes of his heart through all generations.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的寿算永远立定，他心中的思念万代常存。

sentences.english: Vanda miss joaquim is the national flower of singapore.
sentences.chinese: 卓锦万代兰是新加坡的国花。

sentences.english: The company will be regarded as the rule of Huangdi future generations, peace and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 这一吉兆被视为黄帝之统治将千秋万代，和平繁荣。

sentences.english: The counsel of the LORD standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的筹算永远立定，他心中的思念万代常存。

sentences.english: Bandai Namco will deliver lounges for Tekken, Ridge Racer, and Soul Calibur.
sentences.chinese: 万代游戏将提供休息室的铁拳，山脊赛车，并刀魂。

sentences.english: Hoist the plant, for long stretches the vines generations.
sentences.chinese: 葫芦本为藤本植物，藤蔓绵延则寓意万代绵长。

sentences.english: The Lord's purpose is eternal, the designs of his heart go on through all the generations of man.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的寿算永远立定，他心中的思念万代常存。

sentences.english: Only fools believe that a piece of paper can only protect generations to come.
sentences.chinese: 只有傻子才相信一张纸能保千秋万代。

sentences.english: She was, by one rough estimate, your 10,000th-great-grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 粗略的估计一下，她会是您的第一万代曾祖母。

sentences.english: Will you prolong your anger through all generations?
sentences.chinese: 你要将你的怒气延留到万代吗？

sentences.english: But Judah shall dwell for ever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation.
sentences.chinese: 但犹大必存到永远，耶路撒冷必存到万代。

definition: from generation to generation/generation after generation
division of China during earliest dynasties/fig. ancient China/Kyūshū, southernmost of Japan's four major islands
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
to bring honor to one's ancestors and benefit future generations (idiom)
